channel.title: Need help please help RSPS
channel.description: 1) Fishing , we have problem with fishing , when fishing i get fish and i do emote but when i fish he doesn't fish with net or harpoon , cage ... he fish with weapons !!!! 2) smithing , we have problem with smithing , when smithing i use ores , copper,tin i get bronze bar i tried use iron , gold rune , mithril , addy no one work only tin and copper ore 3) minning , when minning its go slow and i should wear pickaxe then i can mine but if i have pickaxe in inventory i cannot mine Sorry for bad english, thanks

item.title: Need help please help RSPS
item.dc:creator: @viliussas14 viliussas14
item.description:
@viliussas14 wrote:

  1. Fishing , we have problem with fishing , when fishing i get fish and i do emote but when i fish he doesn’t fish with net or harpoon , cage … he fish with weapons !!!
  2. smithing , we have problem with smithing , when smithing i use ores , copper,tin i get bronze bar i tried use iron , gold rune , mithril , addy no one work only tin and copper ore
  3. minning , when minning its go slow and i should wear pickaxe then i can mine but if i have pickaxe in inventory i cannot mine
    Sorry for bad english,
    thanks
